title: New experiment demonstrates that reality might actually be real
content:
A team of scientists recently conducted an exciting quantum physics experiment allowing them to demonstrate that reality might actually be real. Well, don’t everybody applaud all at once. It’s actually an amazing feat of science. Let’s start with a simple question. How do you demonstrate that reality is real? You can pinch yourself. But that only demonstrates that you’re capable of perceiving pain. Fictional characters can experience pain, so that doesn’t give us anything to go on. In fact, as I wrote in a recent Neural newsletter, we can’t be 100% sure we don’t live in a doppelganger universe or…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: What if reality wasn't real? Can we prove it? A team of physicists may have just brought us a little closer to the answer.
